title: Corsa Classic: Limited Edition Book ‘The Cinelli Laser Project – Collector Edition’
content:
On October 9th, at 3 PM CET, Corsa Classic, an independent publishing house, is unveiling a 250-page limited edition book, ‘The Cinelli Laser Project – Collector Edition,’ and we’ve got a sneak peek at some of its pages. Read on for the full scoop below!

Corsa Classic, the independent publishing house known for its dedication to cycling history, is proud to announce the release of its highly anticipated book, The Cinelli Laser Project – Collector Edition, on October 9th at 3 PM CET. This exclusive, limited-edition book is a collector’s item that pays tribute to one of the most iconic bicycles of all time: the Cinelli Laser. With only 300 hardcover copies available, each book is individually signed and numbered by the author, Andrea Bonfanti, ensuring its rarity and value. Priced at €80 (10% discount if subscribed to Corsa Classic), The Cinelli Laser Project features hundreds of high-quality photographs and a preface written by Antonio Colombo, the visionary behind the bike. The book takes readers on a journey through the evolution of the Cinelli Laser models from 1981 to 1992, highlighting the groundbreaking designs that revolutionized the world of cycling.

An exclusive, never-seen-before exploration of the Cinelli Laser, one of the most iconic, rare, and valued bicycles of all time. Under the visionary leadership of Antonio Colombo and the expert craftsmanship of Andrea Pesenti, the Cinelli Laser emerged as an icon. These bicycles, with their seamless monolithic frames, precision TIG welding, and advanced geometries, redefined standards of both aesthetics and performance. Each Laser model was a unique masterpiece, meticulously crafted for specific competitive applications. This book reveals the story behind these groundbreaking designs, blending aerodynamics with aesthetics, and chronicles the evolution of the Laser. Through hundreds of high-quality photographs, close-ups, and a detailed timeline of each model, the book presents an extensive selection of genuine models chosen from the about 300 pieces ever produced. The limited-edition hardcover has been restricted to only 300 copies worldwide, with each book individually numbered, ensuring its rarity and increasing its value over time.

Key Highlights:

  • Limited to 300 numbered and signed hardcover copies.
  • Features hundreds of detailed photographs of the Cinelli Laser bicycles.
  • Preface by Antonio Colombo.
  • A true collector’s piece for cycling enthusiasts, historians, and design lovers.
  • Bilingual text in both English and Italian.

Product Details:

  • Title: The Cinelli Laser Project
  • Format: Hardcover, 22×22 cm
  • Pages: 250
  • Language: Bilingual (English and Italian)
  • Price: €80 (10% discount if subscribed to Corsa Classic)
  • Shipping: Worldwide, with shipping costs ranging depending on location

Mark your calendars for October 9th at 3 PM CET to get your hands on one at Corsa Classic.
